content.rendered:
• Powered by a rechargeable Li-ion battery with a long LED lifespan of 50,000 hours.
  • 360° free streak rotation for precise axis measurement.
  • Ideal for dynamic retinoscopy, with two fixation cards and a holder for added functionality.
  • Streak Model: 3-5x brighter than halogen models.
  • Spot Model: 5-8x brighter.
  • Easily visible even in bright rooms with a high color-rendering LED (Ra > 90).
